text:
﻿Chunking
Chunking splits documents into smaller parts. Overlap prevents losing context at boundaries.

﻿Mini-RAG Demo Document

This project indexes documents, embeds chunks, retrieves top-k context,
and answers questions using retrieved context (context-only mode).

﻿Embeddings
Embeddings are vectors representing meaning. Similarity search retrieves the closest vectors.

﻿RAG Overview
RAG retrieves relevant chunks from documents and uses them as context for answering.

﻿Vector Search
Top-k retrieval can use FAISS or cosine similarity with NumPy when FAISS is unavailable.
